title: Flight Simulator 2020 - MSFS Update - Sim Update VIII - released
description:
Asobo has just released Sim Update VIII which is probably the biggest Sim Update which has been released ever. Besides the fixes for the simulator itself like performance enhancement. Improvements are including to fix the weather issues and issues in the training which prevented you from completing the ILS training.

In addition to this the update contains a lot of fixed for both the large airliners but also for the F18 Hornet and Pilatus. The other aircrafts didn't get to much updates.

Besides the fixes there is also some new stuff in MSFS:

- a new spot light event
- revamped marketplace
- new propellor simulation system for  the Cessna 152, Cessna 208 B Grand Caravan EX and Beechcraft King Air 350i

For a full list of fixes review the site below:
https://www.flightsimulator.com/release-notes-1-23-12-0-sim-update-viii-now-available/
